name: Through Space (EduardoFrancio)
description:
Through space is a chill musical game where you fly off around the galaxy orbiting a planet after another trying to get to far away star systems.

How to play:

  • Click and hold to orbit closest planet in range
  • Release click to fly off in the direction you are facing
  • Avoid colliding with asteroids and stars
  • Find a way to the goal marked as a semicircule
